r2b.apps.lib.taskmanager

Class BaseSyncTaskObserver<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • r2b.apps.lib.taskmanager.BaseSyncTaskObserver<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Void or any other object.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public abstract class BaseSyncTaskObserver<V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Wraps an Observer to have a more suitable update interface. WARNING: The notify is made in the same thread as the task is running, you can not make direct gui calls on the "completed" method.
